name: Redneck Fishin' Mac Compatible
description:
This is the Mac compatible version of this game

Users who are not on an apple device are encouraged to check out the original game which has much better visuals!

https://colbydg.itch.io/redneck-fishin

Still not working?

Try these articles to see if they help:

  1. https://discussions.apple.com/thread/252464667
  2. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15141974/does-webgl-work-on-chrome-on-a-mac
